column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Had the 9 appetizer platter (everything was good except the tuna and deviled egg)
column3: fried calamari (sauces were good but there was too much breading)
column7: goat cheese in tomato sauce (probably the best thing on the menu)
column8: rib roast (tender and mashed potatoes were standard)
column10: spicy potatoes (one of the best things I tried)
column14: tender chicken in an Indian inspired sauce
column15: interesting textures with dried fruit and cauliflower)
